name: Attack The Cliffs
short_description:
Source code for a cliff climbing game. Old VGA code. Designed as an exercise in a kind of process oriented programming, this code includes keystroke buffers that empty in bursts for fancy complex game moves from the keyboard. Early use of a rope in a computer game [I think], also has pitons.

A separate cliff editor allows you to create your own sets of cliffs. 

Become athletic and find yourself perched on a narrow ledge, at 2AM, without a rope.
